Changes the source code from C to C++. An example is listed below.

#include <THC/THC.h>
#include <ATen/ATen.h>

ATen_CLASS at::Context &at::globalContext();
THCState *state = at::globalContext().thc_state;

extern "C" int my_lib_add_forward_cuda(THCudaTensor *input1, THCudaTensor *input2,
                                       THCudaTensor *output)
{
  if (!THCudaTensor_isSameSizeAs(state, input1, input2))
    return 0;
  THCudaTensor_resizeAs(state, output, input1);
  THCudaTensor_cadd(state, output, input1, 1.0, input2);
  return 1;
}

extern "C" int my_lib_add_backward_cuda(THCudaTensor *grad_output, THCudaTensor *grad_input)
{
  THCudaTensor_resizeAs(state, grad_input, grad_output);
  THCudaTensor_fill(state, grad_input, 1);
  return 1;
}
